entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: caching, json #49762
  • BlazorWasmHosted build benchmark broken #49760
  • AdditionalAssemblies not working properly in new version of Blazor Web App #49759
  • [Blazor] Component application discovery APIs #49756
    8.0-rc1
  • Blazor component with flickering but only in MAUI #49755
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] Startup APIs API review #49754
    8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] WebAssemblyComponentsEndpointOptions.cs should be defined in `AddWebAssemblyRenderMode` not in the DI container #49753
    8.0-rc2
  • Quarantine RunAsync_WaitsForCompletion_Single_RegistrationParameters #49745
  • NRE when binding to an array with SupplyParametersFromForm #49744
    8.0-rc2
  • OauthMiddleware contains 'Correlation failed' error; #49741

Closed

  • Anchor Links Not Working #49737
  • RDG doesn't support `BindAsync` result with differing nullability #47199
    8.0-rc1
  • Use of proprietary license in AspNetCoreModule-Setup #49512
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #49739
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #49748
  • How to persist data on Blazor SSR + WASM Client in .NET 8 preview 6 #49448
    8.0-rc1
  • Incorrect placement of identifiers #49573
  • EndpointRoutingMiddleware request size log names need improvement #49734
  • My Source Code Are Not Private In Webassembly Blazor #49726
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #49699

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Https instead of Http in InstallNode scripts #49764
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert "Reverting SDK (#49709)" #49763
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Manual reflection based page discovery #49757
    area-blazor
  • Rename rate limiting middleware metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49749
    area-runtime
  • Rename Kestrel metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49747
    area-runtime
  • Rename hosting, routing and error handling metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49743
    area-hosting
  • Update OAuthOptions.cs #49742
    area-security, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23381.2 #49761
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Clean up some code in ANCM #49718
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1
  • Fix BindAsync and misc bugs in RDG #49693
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc1
  • Fix RequestSize-related log names in routing middleware #49740
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc1
  • Quarantine RunAsync_WaitsForCompletion_Single_RegistrationParameters #49746
    area-healthchecks, 8.0-rc1
  • Update DictionaryJumpTable.cs with FrozenDictionary #49714
    Perf, area-runtime, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48460
    blocked, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces references #49716
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Fix flaky tests CanCacheRouteTable #49680
    area-blazor
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #49395
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2232915 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Return LockedOut result from TwoFactorSignInAsync after a failed call #49337
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] SSR unified routing #49622
    area-blazor
  • Improve ANCM file watcher thread management #49696
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Re-run routing for implicit middlewares that require endpoints #49732
    area-security, area-minimal, area-middleware
  • Remove standard keyword #49700
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve MVC and RazorPages debugging #49353
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
